name: [WIP] Dolly's Paradigm
description:
Your ship is stuck in a black hole ! This caused the main computer to malfunction. From now on, you are condemned to be cloned with each death, which blocks you in a loop of resurrection. Find the computer and destroy it, but watch out for hostile aliens on the way... In this retro-fps game, you can use your dead corpse as a mobile checkpoint after respawn.

For the Ludum Dare 47, we tried to make a Doom-like game with Unity. We are on a good start, but the project is obviously not finished. We had not much time and we where outruned by the difficulty of making a decent 3d game. You can't finish the levels but you can actually test the gameplay !
